meanings.definition: Showing signs of wear or damage from being displayed or handled in a store.
meanings.sent1: The shopworn book had torn pages and faded cover.
meanings.sent2: The shopworn shoes had scuff marks and worn-out soles.
meanings.sent3: The shopworn teddy bear looked like it had been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was shopworn, revealing the hardships she had faced.
meanings.sent5: The shopworn car had traveled countless miles, showing its age.

meanings.definition: Lacking originality or freshness due to overuse or repetition.
meanings.sent1: The shopworn joke made everyone groan in boredom.
meanings.sent2: The shopworn excuse failed to convince anyone this time.
meanings.sent3: His shopworn dance moves were always a source of amusement.
meanings.sent4: The shopworn plot of the movie was predictable from the start.
meanings.sent5: Her shopworn catchphrase had lost its charm over the years.
